channel.title: precision instruments on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in precision instruments on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Horiba Logo
Horiba, Ltd. is a Japanese manufacturer of precision instruments for measurement and analysis. They make instruments that measure and analyze automobile exhaust gas, and environmental, medical and scientific applications. Horiba is one of the top 25 analytical and life sciences instrumentation companies in the world. The group has been involved in measurement technology for more than 50 years. It is diversified in 5 different sectors: automotive tests systems, environmental, medical, semiconductor and scientific fields.
You can download theHoribalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Horiba
item.description: Horiba, Ltd. is a Japanese manufacturer of precision instruments for measurement and analysis. They make instruments that measure and analyze automobile exhaust gas, and environmental, medical and scientific applications. Horiba is one of the top 25 analytical and life sciences instrumentation companies in the world. The group has been involved in measurement technology for more than 50 years. It is diversified in 5 different sectors: automotive tests systems, environmental, medical, semiconductor and scientific fields.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Hoya Corporation Logo
Hoya Corporation is a Japanese company manufacturing optical products such as photomasks, photomask blanks and hard disk drive platters, contact lenses and eyeglass lenses for the health-care market, medical photonics, lasers, photographic filters, and software. Hoya Corporation is one of the Forbes Global 2000 Leading Companies and Industry Week 1000 Company. Hoya acquired the camera company Pentax in 2007, for the price of US$1 billion, about 10% more than Pentax was valued at the time.
You can download theHoyalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Hoya acquired the camera company Pentax in 2007, for the price of US$1 billion, about 10% more than Pentax was valued at the time.
